document.discussion_title: Rare albino turtle found on Australia beach
document.topic_text: ( CNN )A rare albino green turtle has been spotted -- newly hatched -- on an Australian beach. Volunteers from Coolum and North Shore Coast Care were "amazed" to see the tiny creature at Castaways Beach, on Queensland 's Sunshine
document.post: ( CNN )A rare albino green turtle has been spotted -- newly hatched -- on an Australian beach. Volunteers from Coolum and North Shore Coast Care were "amazed" to see the tiny creature at Castaways Beach, on Queensland 's Sunshine
